short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to find out what Shopify theme a website is using.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn what Shopify theme a brand is using. We check the website against a database of themes available on the Shopify theme store to give you information on the theme, version, developers who created it, and link to the listing in the Shopify theme store.

At this time, we only support themes available in the Shopify theme store. Themes that are custom or available via third-parties are not supported, but we will still provide a theme name and version when it's a Shopify website.

Our database supports not only active themes on the theme store, but themes that have had their listings removed, retired, or vintage themes.
